page.title: 05ARNPRIOR SCHOOL
page.content: There has been a school in Arnprior for centuries serving the needs of the families of the Garden estate and its farms. The present school celebrated its centenary in 1976. The school buildings were extensively modernised and extended in the late 195o's and the outcome was an excellent blend retaining the character and atmosphere of the old school, while providing for the convenience and space of modern facilities. There are two full_time teachers and they concentrate on the basic subjects _ language, maths and environmental studies. There are, however, also visiting teachers for music, needlework, physical education and, if required, provide remedial assistance. At the moment there are 14 pupils (7 boys and 7 girls). At the age of 12 years the pupils typically go on to High School at Balfron.
